mapper.select: select xq.queue_id, xq.instance_code, xq.act_code, xq.orderby, xq.approver, xq.task_title, xq.approve_status, xu.user_id, xu.user_name, xe.emp_id, xe.emp_code, xe.emp_name, xq.create_dt, xq.create_by, xq.update_dt, xq.update_by from papla_wf_run_ins_act_queue xq, xip_pub_users xu, xip_pub_emps xe where xq.approver = xu.user_id and xu.emp_id = xe.emp_id and xq.instance_code = #{insCode} and xq.act_code = #{actCode} order by xq.orderby

select xq.queue_id, xq.instance_code, xq.act_code, xq.orderby, xq.approver, xq.task_title, xq.approve_status, xq.create_dt, xq.create_by, xq.update_dt, xq.update_by
from work_flow_arch_act_queue xq
from papla_wf_run_ins_act_queue xq
where xq.instance_code = (select a.instance_code from papla_wf_run_instance a where a.instance_id = #{insId}) and xq.act_code = #{actCode} order by xq.orderby

select a.ACT_CATEGORY, a.ACT_ID, a.PROCESS_ID, a.ACT_CODE, a.ACT_NAME, a.ACT_NUM, ri.INSTANCE_ID, p.PROPERTY_CODE, p.PROPERTY_NAME, p.PROPERTY_VALUE from papla_wf_deploy_acts a, papla_wf_deploy_act_attrs p,papla_wf_run_instance ri where a.DEPLOY_ID = ri.DEPLOY_ID and a.ACT_ID = p.ACT_ID and ri.INSTANCE_ID = #{instanceId} and p.PROPERTY_CODE in ('a_is_dynamic_node', 'a_dyna_func_type', 'a_dyna_func_name') and a.ACT_CATEGORY = 'Notice' and exists (select 1 from papla_wf_deploy_act_attrs ap where a.DEPLOY_ID = ap.DEPLOY_ID and a.ACT_ID = ap.ACT_ID and ap.PROPERTY_CODE = 'a_is_dynamic_node' and ap.PROPERTY_VALUE = 'Y')
